√bhī 'fear'

present: [3.] bibhéti  bíbhyati etc. V.+  bibhiyāt   -- [1.] bibhyati  bibhyanti etc. E.+   -- bháyate etc.  

perfect: bibhāya  bibhyus etc. V.+  bībhāya  bibhye   -- bibhayā́ṃ  cakāra  

aorist: [1.] bhes  bhema  bhiyāná  abhāyi   -- [3.] bībhayat  ábībhayanta   -- [4.] ábhaiṣīt etc. V.+  bhais B.+  

future: [1.] abheṣyat   -- [2.] bhetā  

verbal: bhītá V.+  bhetum  -bhīya  bhiyáse  

secondary: passive: bhiyate   -- intensive: bebhī-   -- desiderative: bibhīṣa-   -- causative: bhāyayati etc.  -bhāyya  bhīṣayate etc. B.+  bhīṣayati etc. E.+  bībhiṣas  bībhiṣathās  bhiṣayant  

derivatives: bhī́ V.+  bhayá V.+  bhayya B.  bhiyás V.  bhiyásāna AV.  bhīti C.  bhetavya E.+  bhīmá V.+  bheya E.  bhīrú V.+  -bhīla E.  bhī́s V.B.U.  bhīṣā E.+  bhīṣaka E.+  bhī́ṣaṇa V.+  bhīṣmá B.+  

The 'causative' stem is, of course, a denominative from a derivative noun. Compare √bhyas.
